message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a fair price considering its value and rarity. I'm confident you'll love it!
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $1800000. This is a compromise that still reflects the product's value, and I believe it's a fair price considering our previous discussions. Let me know if you're willing to consider this revised offer.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1600000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering our previous discussions, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'm proposing a price of $1700000, which is a slight concession from my previous offer. I believe this is still a fair price considering the product's value, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement. Let me know if you're willing to consider this revised offer.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $1650000, but I think that's as high as I can go. I'm really interested in this product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm proposing a price of $1675000, which is a slight increase from your offer. I believe this is still a reasonable compromise considering the product's value. Let me know if you're willing to consider this revised offer.
